definition: surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]
giant Amazon snail (Ampullaria gigas spix), that has devastated rice paddies in China since its introduction in the 1980s

sentences.english: I can happily say I've been off drugs for nearly a year now.
sentences.chinese: 我可以兴奋地说我此刻快一年没有沾过福寿膏了。

sentences.english: It seemed like a harmless drug.
sentences.chinese: 年夜麻看上往像是一种无害的福寿膏。

sentences.english: The Fortunate Life Ridge station platform is narrow, dusky and exceptionally quiet.
sentences.chinese: 地铁福寿岭站站台狭窄，光线昏暗，安静异常。

sentences.english: The differences of the three types were difficult to judge under scanning electron microscope.
sentences.chinese: 在扫描电镜下，三类福寿螺的齿舌未见明显不同。

sentences.english: You head carve pattern longevity, you handle inlaid auspicious cloud the mast.
sentences.chinese: 如意头雕琢福寿图纹，如意柄尾镶嵌吉祥云纹黄杨木。

sentences.english: Amazonian snail's endangerment on rice is very severe.
sentences.chinese: 福寿螺对水稻的为害十分严重。

sentences.english: I want to wish you longevity and health.
His friends insisted he had no connection with drugs.
sentences.chinese: 他的友人坚持认为他跟福寿膏出有关联。

sentences.english: May humans taste the honey-dripping peach by heart and kind people have good fortune and healthy long life.
sentences.chinese: 愿人类用心去品尝滴蜜的桃，愿善良的人们福寿康宁。

sentences.english: The invention discloses a Fushou mead and a production method thereof.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种补肝暖胃的福寿蜜酒及生产方法。

definition: to accept a life of ease/to enjoy a comfortable retirement
lit. (may the) five blessings descend upon this home (namely: longevity, wealth, health, virtue, and a natural death)/(an auspicious saying for the Lunar New Year)
may your happiness be as immense as the East Sea (idiom)
We wish you long life and riches! (idiom, conventional greeting)
May you have peace year after year (New Year's greeting)
surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]
Longfeng district of Daqing city 大慶|大庆[Da4 qing4], Heilongjiang
(myth.) peaches of immortality, kept by Xi Wangmu/fresh or confectionery peaches offered as a birthday gift
Live as long as the Zhongnan Mountains! (idiom)/Long may you live!
